name: ARG: The Journey For The Sushitos
name_original: ARG: The Journey For The Sushitos
description:
So, did ya ever felt that you need to be an angry Russian guy whos snacks had been stolen by a demonic rat that lives in your basement?

No? Just me?

Anyways, if you wanted that,  which I'd doubt, you have it in this absolutely god-awful gane made for ludum dare 48 in 72 hours by a snack and a squirrel.

Enjoy, and remember that no rats (and no Russians) were hurt while creating this game.

Oh, and also the creators are Russian themselve- wha? Polish is NOT Russian? Shut up, no one will notice.

We really like Russians pls don't sue us Putin

Authors:

Sushi Plushie  - An artist and my personal butt saver

TRUEchips - The madman that decided that this is a good idea in the first place, and made a shitty rpg maker game in 3 days

Rozali - An emotional support so lazy that she didn't do anything (Including but not limited to emotional support)
